briefTitle: A Multicenter Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Xyrem With an Open- Label Pharmacokinetic Evaluation and Safety Extension in Pediatric Subjects With Narcolepsy With Cataplexy
summary: The purpose of this trial is to assess the efficacy and safety of Xyrem in pediatrics subjects with narcolepsy that includes cataplexy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Weekly Number of Cataplexy Attacks
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From the end of the Stable Dose Period to the end of the Double-blind Treatment Period (2 weeks)
